mapper.select: select a.id,a.title,a.table_name,b.description,b.html_id,a.publish_date, '11501' as info_type,c.project_Name from CMS_V_PUBLISH_INFO a,CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT b,CMS_PROJECT c where a.id=b.id and a.id=#{id} and c.PROJECT_SOURCE_ID=a.id limit 0,1
select a.record_id id,a.title,a.table_name,a.description,a.html_id,a.publish_date, '11502' as info_type from CMS_ZBGG_M a where a.record_id=#{id}
select a.record_id id,a.title,a.table_name,a.description,a.html_id,a.publish_date, '11503' as info_type from CMS_ZBGS_M a where a.record_id=#{id}
mapper.sql:
where a.id=b.id
and a.area_name in
#{item}
and (a.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.description like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and
a.category like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
and
(a.table_name='XMXX')
(a.table_name='ZBXX' and a.table_name2!='ZBGS')
(a.table_name='ZBXX' and a.table_name2='ZBGS')
and a.publish_date >= #{startDate}
and a.publish_date < #{endDate}
mapper.select:
select count(a.area_id) as nums,a.area_name as area from CMS_V_PUBLISH_INFO a,CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT b
GROUP BY a.area_name order by nums desc

select (CASE when a.table_name='XMXX' THEN '项目' WHEN a.table_name='ZBXX' and a.table_name2='ZBGS' THEN '中标' WHEN a.table_name='ZBXX' and a.table_name2!='ZBGS' THEN '招标' END) as type , count(a.id) as countinfo, year(a.publish_date) as countyear from CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT b,CMS_V_PUBLISH_INFO a
group by type,countyear order by countinfo desc

select sum(CASE when a.table_name='XMXX' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as project , sum(CASE when a.table_name='ZBXX' and a.table_name2='ZBGS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as bid , sum(CASE when a.table_name='ZBXX' and a.table_name2!='ZBGS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as tender , CONCAT(year(a.publish_date),"-", LPAD(month(a.publish_date),2,0)) time from CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT b,CMS_V_PUBLISH_INFO a
group by time order by time asc

select count(a.id) as countinfo, year(a.publish_date) as year from CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT b,CMS_V_PUBLISH_INFO a
group by year order by year desc
